A

Account - Class in core
Represents a general account with basic attributes such as accountId, username, and password.
Account(String, String, String) - Constructor for class core.Account
Constructs a new Account with the specified accountId, username, and password.
accountId - Variable in class core.Account
 
AccountManager - Class in core
Manages the creation, linking, and validation of accounts.
AccountManager(DataManager) - Constructor for class core.AccountManager
Constructs an AccountManager with the specified DataManager.
accountType - Variable in class core.Account
 
addChildAccount(String) - Method in class core.ParentAccount
Adds a child account ID to the set of child accounts.
addParentAccount(String) - Method in class core.ChildAccount
Adds a parent account ID to the set of parent accounts.
addSavingGoal(SavingGoal) - Method in class core.ChildAccount
Adds a saving goal to the list of saving goals.
addTask(Task) - Method in class core.ChildAccount
Adds a task to the list of tasks.
AssignmentFrame - Class in ui.parent
AssignmentFrame is a graphical user interface frame designed for parents to set or edit tasks for their child's account.
AssignmentFrame(AccountManager, ParentAccount, ChildAccount) - Constructor for class ui.parent.AssignmentFrame
Constructs an AssignmentFrame for setting a new task.
AssignmentFrame(AccountManager, ParentAccount, ChildAccount, Task) - Constructor for class ui.parent.AssignmentFrame
Constructs an AssignmentFrame for setting or editing a task.
AwardFrame - Class in ui.parent
AwardFrame is a graphical user interface frame designed for parents to give awards to their child's account.
AwardFrame(AccountManager, ParentAccount) - Constructor for class ui.parent.AwardFrame
Constructs an AwardFrame for giving an award.
